creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: single line of calligraphy with seal URC; loopy signature at L; two seals LL
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

Flowers have pure fragrance: the moon casts lovely shadows
markings: Seals URC: [Nantenbō]; LLQ: [kaō]; [Seventy plus eight, Nantenbō]; [Tōjū]
signed: L edge: [An old man at age seventy-eight, Nantenbō]
title: Calligraphy
